body_html:
Hi Asim,
Thanks for the help. I will delete the other issue.
When an issue is closed, I am never quite sure if anyone ever sees it again, so I generally create a new one. Closed issues seem to disappear. It would be nice if we could be given a short while to respond.
I will change to r0.12.1. I just need to find the pip to force a downgrade.

FYI. I changed the code to:

lstm_cell_1 = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(n_hidden)
outputs, states = tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn(lstm_cell_1, Xnew, dtype=tf.float32)

For the record, here is the error message:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-27-ae6b63faf2e1> in <module>()
     43 l2 = lambda_loss_amount * sum(tf.nn.l2_loss(tf_var) for tf_var in tf.trainable_variables())
     44 # L2 loss prevents this overkill neural network to overfit the data
---> 45 cost = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(pred, y)) + l2 # Softmax loss
     46 optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer(learning_rate=learning_rate).minimize(cost) # Adam Optimizer
     47 

/Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.pyc in softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(_sentinel, labels, logits, dim, name)
   1576   """
   1577   _ensure_xent_args("softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits", _sentinel,
-> 1578                     labels, logits)
   1579 
   1580   # TODO(pcmurray) Raise an error when the labels do not sum to 1. Note: This

/Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.pyc in _ensure_xent_args(name, sentinel, labels, logits)
   1531   if sentinel is not None:
   1532     raise ValueError("Only call `%s` with "
-> 1533                      "named arguments (labels=..., logits=..., ...)" % name)
   1534   if labels is None or logits is None:
   1535     raise ValueError("Both labels and logits must be provided.")

ValueError: Only call `softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` with named arguments (labels=..., logits=..., ...)
body_text:
Hi Asim,
Thanks for the help.  I will delete the other issue.
When an issue is closed, I am never quite sure if anyone ever sees it again, so I generally create a new one.  Closed issues seem to disappear.  It would be nice if we could be given a short while to respond.
I will change to r0.12.1.  I just need to find the pip to force a downgrade.
FYI.  I changed the code to:
lstm_cell_1 = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(n_hidden)
outputs, states = tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn(lstm_cell_1, Xnew, dtype=tf.float32)

For the record, here is the error message:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-27-ae6b63faf2e1> in <module>()
     43 l2 = lambda_loss_amount * sum(tf.nn.l2_loss(tf_var) for tf_var in tf.trainable_variables())
     44 # L2 loss prevents this overkill neural network to overfit the data
---> 45 cost = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(pred, y)) + l2 # Softmax loss
     46 optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer(learning_rate=learning_rate).minimize(cost) # Adam Optimizer
     47

-> 1578                     labels, logits)

   1535     raise ValueError("Both labels and logits must be provided.")

ValueError: Only call `softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` with named arguments (labels=..., logits=..., ...)
body:
Hi Asim,
Thanks for the help.  I will delete the other issue.  
When an issue is closed, I am never quite sure if anyone ever sees it again, so I generally create a new one.  Closed issues seem to disappear.  It would be nice if we could be given a short while to respond.
I will change to r0.12.1.  I just need to find the `pip` to force a downgrade.

FYI.  I changed the code to:
```
lstm_cell_1 = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(n_hidden)
outputs, states = tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn(lstm_cell_1, Xnew, dtype=tf.float32)
```
For the record, here is the error message:
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-27-ae6b63faf2e1> in <module>()
     43 l2 = lambda_loss_amount * sum(tf.nn.l2_loss(tf_var) for tf_var in tf.trainable_variables())
     44 # L2 loss prevents this overkill neural network to overfit the data
---> 45 cost = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(pred, y)) + l2 # Softmax loss
     46 optimizer = tf.train.AdamOptimizer(learning_rate=learning_rate).minimize(cost) # Adam Optimizer
     47 

/Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.pyc in softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(_sentinel, labels, logits, dim, name)
   1576   """
   1577   _ensure_xent_args("softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits", _sentinel,
-> 1578                     labels, logits)
   1579 
   1580   # TODO(pcmurray) Raise an error when the labels do not sum to 1. Note: This

/Users/kevin/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.pyc in _ensure_xent_args(name, sentinel, labels, logits)
   1531   if sentinel is not None:
   1532     raise ValueError("Only call `%s` with "
-> 1533                      "named arguments (labels=..., logits=..., ...)" % name)
   1534   if labels is None or logits is None:
   1535     raise ValueError("Both labels and logits must be provided.")

ValueError: Only call `softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` with named arguments (labels=..., logits=..., ...)
```
